He is working to build ethical AI systems that reflect human values like love and connection. He believes humans will remain the "boss" of future AI systems.

articles.title: ‘Dumb' AI bots collude to rig markets, Wharton research finds
articles.author: Lu Wang
articles.summary: In simulations of real-world markets, trading agents powered by artificial intelligence formed price-fixing cartels without explicit instruction. The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority invited the researchers to present their findings at a seminar. Some quant firms have expressed interest in clear regulatory guidelines and rules on AI-powered algorithmic trading execution.

articles.title: Our kids think AI is everything from cool to cringy
articles.author: JESSICA SAGGIO
articles.summary: My daughter doesn't want to wear the T-shirt for her softball team because it looks like AI. My 8-year-old daughter has had Amazon Alexa devices around the house since she was a baby, but she doesn't associate AI with Alexa or other helpful tools like ChatGPT. Many parents ask their kids what they think about AI. Many of them are leery.

articles.title: Hassabis on AI: 10X Bigger Than the Industrial Revolution
articles.author: Steve Rose
articles.summary: The head of Google's DeepMind believes artificial intelligence could usher in an era of 'incredible productivity' and 'radical abundance'. He wishes the tech giants had moved more slowly though.    - who will it benefit and why does he wish they had moved faster?

articles.title: UX Roundup: Designers in Denial  3 Levels of Corporate AI Use  AI Improves Medical Diagnosis  Ideogram Character Consistency  Bad Study Methodology
articles.author: Jakob Nielsen
articles.summary: In the All Things Design podcast, I accused the UX profession of being in denial about AI. I predicted the rise of the 'pancake' organization and the 10x productivity leap caused by AI. The hard skills that designers have spent their careers perfecting are on the fast track to obsolescence. Big enterprises will cut design teams in half, but mid-sized and small companies can afford good design now.

articles.title: Career centers embrace careful use of AI during job search
articles.author: Claire Powell
articles.summary: The University of Missouri recommends students can use AI chatbots to generate the first draft of their cover letter. The school is still working to adapt to AI. AI helps with brainstorming ideas, organizing essays and making sentences clearer, but it doesn't help with creativity.

articles.title: It's not an AI-bubble; it's a longer-term bull market, says this Wall St firm

articles.title: When Your Job Interviewer Isn't Human
articles.summary: Companies are increasingly using AI to help sort, schedule, and screen applicants in a race to reduce hiring costs and time. Kendall McGill didn't know she was being interviewed by an AI agent. Wafa Shafiq was surprised when she was interviewed for a marketing specialist role in the fall.

articles.title: ‘AI Will Take Over 80% Of Jobs': Vinod Khosla's Stark Forecast, Yet He Remains Hopeful

Apple has a multi-pronged approach to AI advancement spanning multiple areas.

articles.summary: Vinod Khosla, Sundar Pichai, Satya Nadella and other tech leaders discuss AI vs. jobs in this article. For more, see: AI vs Jobs: What do they think? and AI vs jobs: What are the opinions of tech leaders?

Public universities are leading the push on the state's involvement with AI.

CECS helps learners design careers that cross traditional boundaries.

It can take on many forms, from a separate class to being incorporated into students' interactions with AI Abraham Lincoln.

articles.summary: As artificial intelligence becomes more integrated into everyday life, The Washington Informer is exploring how these tools could support its journalism. Take our short survey and help shape how we use AI in our newsroom.      Â   .

articles.title: Trump's AI action plan
articles.author: Andrew Rice
articles.summary: Agencies across the federal government are developing data centers across the United States and implementing AI technology in health research. President Trump's AI Action Plan includes more than 90 policy actions aimed at rolling back environmental regulations, increasing domestic data center outputs, and integrating AI into operations. The Energy Department named the Idaho National Laboratory, Oak Ridge Reservation in Tennessee, Paducah Gaseous Diffusion Plant in Kentucky, and Savannah River Site in South Carolina as locations for private partnerships to build AI centers.

articles.title: Apex Abatement and Demolition LLC Releases Instant Budget Calculator for Property Owners : CEG
articles.author: Apex Abatement
articles.summary: Apex Abatement and Demolition LLC has launched an AI-powered Instant Demolition Budget Calculator to provide quick estimates for property owners and contractors. The free online tool provides rough cost estimates for commercial and residential demolition projects. It is accessible online for free and offers valuable insights into project costs.
